## Classes

### Project

Defined in `nexla_sdk/models/projects/responses.py:21`

Project response model.

- `owner`: `Owner`
- `org`: `Organization`
- `name`: `str`

- `client_url`: `Optional`
- `flows_count`: `Optional`
- `tags`: `List`
- `copied_from_id`: `Optional`

- `updated_at`: `Optional`
